definition: junk/items of no value/various bits and bobs

sentences.english: When he tidied the room up, he put the odds and ends into a miscellaneous box.
sentences.chinese: 他收拾房間時，把七零八碎的東西全扔進雜物箱。

sentences.english: Clear a little clutter by getting rid of something you don’t need.
sentences.chinese: 通過扔棄不需要的東西來清理散亂的雜物。

sentences.english: He took a hammer from the bench and picked out a few nails from one of the disordered bins.
sentences.chinese: 他從長凳上拿起錘子，又從雜物箱裏摸出了幾個釘子。

sentences.english: Sticky debris if the water should be processed using special filters.
sentences.chinese: 如果水中有黏性雜物，應採用專用過濾器進行處理。

sentences.english: Large utility room with cabinets galore and access to 2-car garage.
sentences.chinese: 大雜物房和櫥櫃，可通到兩個車庫。

sentences.english: The two leftest rooms are warehouses where my mother keeps some grains or groceries.
sentences.chinese: 最左邊兩間是倉庫我母親放些糧食和雜物。

sentences.english: He and his wife navigated their car around fallen trees and other debris to get to Kerri's home.
sentences.chinese: 他和妻子開車繞過倒下的樹和其他雜物來到凱利的家。

sentences.english: Among the rubbish, you find a Halberd of the Swiftwatch.
sentences.chinese: 在地上的雜物間，你發現一柄迅捷戟。

sentences.english: Motor nets to prevent the motor inhaling debris.
sentences.chinese: 馬達網罩，防止馬達吸進雜物。

sentences.english: Bottom ash is sluiced from the bottom of boilers and the water is conveyed to settling ponds.
sentences.chinese: 底灰是從鍋爐底部沉澱池沖洗出來的雜物。

sentences.english: The arthroscopic procedure will clean up rough spots on the underside of his left knee cap.
sentences.chinese: 這次手術將清除拜納姆左膝蓋骨下的雜物和積液。

sentences.english: Friends of the Earth put litter into a litter bin.
sentences.chinese: 地球的朋友把垃圾放進一隻雜物箱。

sentences.english: When cleaning the dumbwaiter lift, the utility power of the lift must be cut off first.
sentences.chinese: 雜物電梯在清潔時，必須在切斷電梯動力電源後進行。

sentences.english: Maybe I do need one tiny bin after all.
sentences.chinese: 也許我真的需要一個小雜物箱。
噢，你的自行車在雜物間呢。

sentences.english: There should also be a sand exhausting ditch in front of the washing pond in order to remove impurities.
sentences.chinese: 在第一個淘洗池前方還需另設一排沙槽，以清除雜物。

definition: to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to set up/to arrange/to lay out
